creator: VishakR
title: Cycle Sharing- Bolt IoT Techniche
description: The project aims to design a cycle-sharing system that tracks cycle locations and displays availability online. The project focuses on displaying cycle availability using a circuit connected to a padlock. A simple website is also created to display available cycles and redirect users to the Bolt IoT module to see the availability.
steps: Implement a circuit on cycles using padlocks where the circuit closes when locked, indicating availability.
Connect the circuit output to the Bolt IoT module to determine if the cycle is locked (HIGH) or unlocked (LOW).
Develop a simple website with tabs, including one listing available cycles.
Upon selecting a cycle on the website, redirect the user to the Bolt IoT module's IP address.
Load code onto the Bolt IoT module to display the cycle's availability status.
